code: import{api}from"../apiClient";export var getUserGuilds=function getUserGuilds(){return api.get("/guilds");};export var createGuild=function createGuild(body){return api.post("/guilds/create",body);};export var joinGuild=function joinGuild(body){return api.post("/guilds/join",body);};export var getInviteLink=function getInviteLink(id){var isPermanent=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:false;return api.get("/guilds/".concat(id,"/invite").concat(isPermanent?"?isPermanent=true":""));};export var invalidateInviteLinks=function invalidateInviteLinks(id){return api.delete("/guilds/".concat(id,"/invite"));};export var getGuildMembers=function getGuildMembers(id){return api.get("/guilds/".concat(id,"/members"));};export var editGuild=function editGuild(id,body){return api.put("/guilds/".concat(id),body,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"}});};export var deleteGuild=function deleteGuild(id){return api.delete("/guilds/".concat(id,"/delete"));};export var getGuildMemberSettings=function getGuildMemberSettings(id){return api.get("/guilds/".concat(id,"/member"));};export var changeGuildMemberSettings=function changeGuildMemberSettings(id,body){return api.put("/guilds/".concat(id,"/member"),body);};export var kickMember=function kickMember(guildId,memberId){return api.post("/guilds/".concat(guildId,"/kick"),{memberId:memberId});};export var banMember=function banMember(guildId,memberId){return api.post("/guilds/".concat(guildId,"/bans"),{memberId:memberId});};export var leaveGuild=function leaveGuild(id){return api.delete("guilds/".concat(id));};export var getBanList=function getBanList(id){return api.get("guilds/".concat(id,"/bans"));};export var unbanMember=function unbanMember(guildId,memberId){return api.delete("guilds/".concat(guildId,"/bans"),{data:{memberId:memberId}});};
